Title: Controllable Sonoro Project Research Report No. 20
Text:
Objective:
- To expand the existing Sonoro Sphere and identify weak points in the Spatial Prism Barriers.
- To contain residual Lament energy and establish control over the Sonoro.


Progress:
Field Test No. 20
- Irideglow capture efficiency increased by 7.12%.
- Small amount of Light Irideglow Crystals detected (confirmed as Lament residue).
- Stasis field collapsed after 8 minutes and 11 seconds (3 monitoring units damaged).
- Anomalous spatial rift detected.
...

Status Assessment:
- Lament frequency for this period deviated by 1.45% from the baseline.
- Current containment methods are insufficient to support continued experimentation.
